headline: SLB OneSubsea awarded subsea boosting contract by Petrobras for the Buzios field
summary: Global energy technology company SLB (SLB) announced a contract award by Petrobras (PBR), following a competitive tender, to its OneSubsea joint venture for two subsea raw seawater injection RWI systems to increase recovery from the prolific Buzios field.The subsea RWI systems will help to increase the production of floating production storage and offloading FPSO vessels, which are currently bottlenecked in their water injection capacities.
